document_data.mainbody:
Imgaths Guide to Etiquette was a book authored by Imgath Gland, the author of Imgaths Guide to Stonemasonry and one of the authors of the Travelers Guide to Silverymoon â€“ Inns, Taverns, and Local Law, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
A copy of Imgaths Guide to Etiquette belonged to Manshoon XII, a clone of Manshoon, in the . The book was stored in the mages library of mundane and arcane tomes in his lair in an abandoned temple of Amaunator underneath the City of the Dead of Waterdeep.
